alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lake County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1114 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Raymond to Channel Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waukegan, North Chicago, Gurnee, Zion, Antioch, Lake Villa, Lindenhurst, Beach Park, Gages Lake, Park City, Winthrop Harbor, Lake Bluff, Grandwood Park, Wadsworth, Venetian Village, Channel Lake, Lake Catherine, Old Mill Creek and Russell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Illinois.
